price: Na anaye fanya juhudi basi bila ya shaka anafanya juhudi kwa ajili ya nafsi yake. Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu si mhitaji wa walimwengu.
arabic: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waman jāhada fa-innamā yujāhidu linafsihi inna al-laha laghaniyyun ʿani al-ʿālamīna
